content.text: Thanks [@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)! By the way, when should repos be added the GitHub org? I've noticed that some of the plugins and *especially* Patchbay pages are under personal GitHub accounts, but I wasn't sure whether that was because they didn't want to clutter the org or because they didn't want to give write access to org members. Maybe this has been discussed before?
